models module

class models.Course(course_id, course_name, instructor)[source]

Bases: object

A class representing a course.

course_id

The unique ID of the course.

Type:

str

course_name

The name of the course.

Type:

str

instructor

The instructor assigned to the course.

Type:

Instructor

students

A list of students enrolled in the course.

Type:

list

add_student(student)[source]

Add a student to the course.

Parameters:

student (Student) – The student to be added to the course.

Actions:

  • Adds the student to the course’s list of students.

class models.Instructor(name, age, email, instructor_id)[source]

Bases: Person

A class representing an instructor, which inherits from the Person class.

instructor_id

The unique ID of the instructor.

Type:

str

assigned_courses

A list of courses assigned to the instructor.

Type:

list

assign_course(course)[source]

Assign the instructor to a course.

Parameters:

course (Course) – The course to assign to the instructor.

Actions:

  • Adds the course to the instructor’s list of assigned courses.

class models.Person(name, age, email)[source]

Bases: object

A class representing a person with basic attributes like name, age, and email.

name

The name of the person.

Type:

str

age

The age of the person.

Type:

int

_email

The private email address of the person.

Type:

str

introduce()[source]

Introduce the person.

Returns:

A string introducing the person with their name and age.

Return type:

str

class models.Student(name, age, email, student_id)[source]

Bases: Person

A class representing a student, which inherits from the Person class.

student_id

The unique ID of the student.

Type:

str

registered_courses

A list of courses the student has registered for.

Type:

list

register_course(course)[source]

Register the student for a course.

Parameters:

course (Course) – The course to register the student for.

Actions:

  • Adds the course to the student’s list of registered courses.
